text: My nisposlali tebe Pisaniye s istinoy v podtverzhdeniye prezhnikh Pisaniy, i dlya togo, chtoby ono predokhranyalo ikh (ili svidetel'stvovalo o nikh; ili vozvysilos' nad nimi). Sudi zhe ikh soglasno tomu, chto nisposlal Allakh, i ne potakay ikh zhelaniyam, uklonyayas' ot yavivsheysya k tebe istiny. Kazhdomu iz vas My ustanovili zakon i put'. Yesli by Allakh pozhelal, to sdelal by vas odnoy obshchinoy, odnako On razdelil vas, chtoby ispytat' vas tem, chto On daroval vam. Sostyazaytes' zhe v dobrykh delakh. Vsem vam predstoit vernut'sya k Allakhu, i On povedayet vam o tom, v chem vy raskhodilis' vo mneniyakh
